Package index

All functions

aic()
Compute the \(AIC\) based on \(SSE\)

Compute the autocorrelation of the residuals
bias()
Compute the mean of the residuals
bic()
Compute the \(BIC\) based on \(SSE\)

Count the number of parameters in the covariance matrix
